verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Stand by eveything You said, newline Stand by the promises we made, newline Let go of everything I've done, newline I'll run into Your open arms, newline And all I know, Is that...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I love You newline more than life. newline I love You newline more than life.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Fall back on everything You've done newline Fall back on everlasting arms, newline When all the world is swept away, newline You are all the things I need. newline You're the air I breath...

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: How can it be You were the one on the cross, newline Lifted for all our shame? newline How can it be the scars in Your hands newline Are for me? newline You are the King of All.
